name: Anton Dash!
description:
Anton from Antonball fame has gone and gotten himself into a tricky situation - a wee much booze and he's down in the sewers of Boiler City again! This time without his trusty ballpanion, he's got to bash n' dash his way back to the surface, or risk turning into hairy sewer croc snacks! Better a small headache than that, eh?

This is version 0.2 which contains one stage.

CONTROLS:

  • Z - Jump. (On menus) Select.
  • A - Dash. (On menus) Select.
  • X or S - (On menus) Cancel.
  • Arrow keys - (On menus) Move cursor.
  • Left/Right keys - Move.
  • Down key - (Hold) Duck.
  • Enter - Pause.
  • Spacebar - (When paused) Go to title.
